name: sanskrit-transcoder
description: Transcode sanskrit strings to and from the SLP1 transliteration scheme

scripts.prepare: npm run setup-module && npm run install-dependencies
scripts.install-transcoder: cd test/util/ext && rm -rf sanskrit-transcoding && git clone git@github.com:funderburkjim/sanskrit-transcoding.git && cd ../../..
scripts.install-dict: cd test/util/ext && wget http://www.sanskrit-lexicon.uni-koeln.de/scans/MWScan/2014/downloads/mwxml.zip && unzip mwxml.zip xml/mw.xml && rm mwxml.zip && cd ../../..
scripts.test: npm run test-lint && npm run test-components

author: Arjun Mehta
